reviews.review_msg: Michael is the kindest professor. Soft-spoken, understanding & someone I wish more professors were like. His classes, mostly lectures & videos were engaging, making me rethink education. Was a bit unorganized due to a busy semester, but it's understandable. A group presentation near the end. Will take another course with him again in the future!

Micheal is an amazing instructor and person. He truly cares about his students learning and well being. His lectures are very interesting and will make you want to become an educator. At first, you may find that his instructions are vague but there is a method to all his madness. I would take his class again in a heartbeat.
Honestly his class is simply life changing. The world needs more people like micheal.

Michael is an amazing prof. He is very engaging and his lectures are super interesting. He is truly a great teacher and the way the course is delivered is not like any other class I have taken. Not only is he one of the best profs ever he also occasionally brings Candy. I would recommend this course to everyone you will like it no matter what.

Super easy GPA booster class. Michael is a great guy and he's really engaging. He's always there to chat and help. If you miss one class it doesn't really matter because he always talks about the same things but he seems a bit confused sometimes. I had no idea how the class was graded but it was easy.

I took Michael's class in my last semester at SFU and he is AMAZING. Please take his class if you GENUINELY care about education. He really has a passion for teaching and you can tell that through his lectures/discussions with students, so please understand that profs like him are a rare breed so please DO NOT TAKE HIM FOR GRANTED. Go2 all classes
Best teacher ever! He was very clear and extremely enthusiastic about education. I would recommend any class that Michael Ling teaches.
